revised_title: Development of the Calcareous Test in Echinocardium Cordatum
tldr: The author studied the development of the calcareous test in Echinocardium cordatum, a type of sea urchin. They examined the test's development from its earliest appearance in the Echinopluteus stage to the adult stage. This research provided a detailed analysis of the post-larval development of the species, which was not well understood before.
